SELECT DISTINCT SCORE_EXAM_ID scoreExamId, SCORE_EXAM_NAME scoreExamName, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(TERM,'XQ') termId, CREATE_TIME createTime FROM T_JW_SCORE_EXAM WHERE SCORE_EXAM_ID in (SELECT DISTINCT SCORE_EXAM_ID FROM T_JW_SCORE_CLASS WHERE CLASS_ID=(SELECT CLASS_ID FROM T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS WHERE STUDENT_ID=#{studentId})) and term=#{term}
AND FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(SCORE_EXAM_ID, 'T_JW_SCORE_EXAM', 'SCORE_EXAM_ID', 'SCORE_EXAM_NAME') LIKE #{scoreExamName}

SELECT DISTINCT FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(CLASS_ID,'T_XG_CLASS','CLASS_ID','CLASS_NAME') classId, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(DEPARTMENTS_ID) departmentsId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(MAJOR_CODE, 'T_XG_MAJOR', 'MAJOR_CODE', 'MAJOR_NAME') majorCode, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(TRAINING_LEVEL,'ZXZYPYCC') trainingLevel FROM T_XG_CLASS WHERE CLASS_ID=(SELECT CLASS_ID FROM T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS WHERE STUDENT_ID=#{studentId})

SELECT DISTINCT t.STUDENT_ID studentId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.STUDENT_ID,'T_XG_STUDENT','STUDENT_ID','NAME') studentName, t.SUBJECT_ID subjectId, t.CLASS_ID classId, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(t.DEPARTMENTS_ID) departmentsId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.MAJOR_CODE, 'T_XG_MAJOR', 'MAJOR_CODE', 'MAJOR_NAME') majorCode, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.TRAINING_LEVEL,'ZXZYPYCC') trainingLevel, t.PLAN_ID planId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.COURSE_ID, 'T_JW_COURSE', 'COURSE_ID', 'COURSE_NAME') courseId, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.PERSON_ID) personId, t.SCORE_EXAM_ID scoreExamId, t.SCORE_EXAM_NAME scoreExamName, t.TERM_ID termId, t.SCORE score, t.MAKEUP_SCORE makeupScore, t.GRADUATE_MAKEUP_SCORE graduateMakeupScore, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.EXAMINATION_STATUS, 'KSZT') examinationStatus, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.MAKEUP_STATUS, 'KSZT') makeupStatus, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.GRADUATE_MAKEUP_STATUS, 'KSZT') graduateMakeupStatus, s.TOTAL_SCORE totalScore, s.PASS_SCORE passScore, t.create_time FROM T_JW_SCORE_IMPORT t,T_JW_SCORE_SUBJECT s WHERE t.SUBJECT_ID=s.SUBJECT_ID AND t.STUDENT_ID=#{studentId} AND t.SCORE_EXAM_ID=#{scoreExamId}
SELECT * FROM t_kh_evaluation_emps_members m WHERE EVALUATION_FLAG='0' AND m.member_person_id = #{loginid}
